mapper.insert: insert into user_tb (user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, email, phone, is_leave, is_pause, zonecode, first_address, second_address) values( user_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{phone}, 0, 0, #{zoneCode}, #{firstAddress}, #{secondAddress} )
mapper.select: select user_id, user_pw, user_name, email, phone from user_tb where user_id = #{userId} and user_pw = #{userPw} and is_leave = 0 and is_pause = 0
select count(*) from user_tb where user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) from user_tb where email = #{email}
select count(*) from user_tb where phone = #{phone}
select user_id from user_tb where user_name= #{userName} and phone = #{phone}
select * from user_tb where user_id= #{userId} and email = #{email}
mapper.update: update user_tb set user_pw = #{userPw} where user_id=#{userId}
